name: 2 Pounds of Lye (Sodium Hydroxide)
description:
Lye, also known as caustic soda, is the common name for Sodium Hydroxide (NaOH). Lye is a necessary ingredient in making bar soap. 

If mishandled, lye is a dangerous chemical. Children and animals should be kept away from it at all times. Lye is very corrosive and should never be ingested or allowed to come in contact with the body or clothing. When working with lye always use extreme care and work in a well ventilated area. Protective gloves, protective eyewear and a disposable face mask should be worn. Use lye-resistant containers such as ceramic or stainless steel. 

NEVER pour water into lye, ALWAYS pour lye slowly into water. The combination of water and lye heats to approximately 200 degrees Farenheit.

We only ship Lye to the 48 contiguous states to comply with federal shipping requirements.  We also only ship Lye via ground through USPS or UPS.

Please read the Safety Information section of this website before purchasing.

name: Shea Butter - 1 pound
description:
Shea butter is a pure, solid oil that is a key ingredient used in lotion making, lip balm and soap making recipes. This offering is for 1 pound of refined shea butter which is a creamy, white color with a neutral smell.

Your shea butter will be shipped to you in a freezer bag to keep our costs competitive. However, your shea butter should simply be stored in a cool place. The shelf life of shea butter is one to two years. 

INCI name: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter

Lotion Bar Recipe:

1.5 oz. Beeswax
1 oz. Cocoa Butter
1.5 oz. Shea Butter
2 oz. Sweet Almond Oil
1/4 Teaspoon Vitamin E 

Melt and mix well. Pour Into any container (lotion bar tubes work great)

name: Palm Oil - 5 pounds
description:
This variety of Palm Oil is refined, food grade palm oil. Palm oil can be used in cold process soap making to make a hard bar and is a key ingredient in many soap recipes. Palm oil can also be used in balms and body. Palm oil is rich in palmitic acid, vitamin E, vitamin K and magnesium and is onsidered to be a natural source of anti-oxidants.

Palm oil is a form of vegetable oil obtained from the fruit of the Oil palm tree. Each fruit contains a single seed (the palm kernel) surrounded by a soft oily pulp. Oil is extracted from both the pulp of the fruit (palm oil) and the kernel (palm kernel oil).

Shelf Life: 2 years

Other quantities are available (1 pound, etc.) Just e-mail us for pricing.

name: Coconut Oil - 5 pounds
description:
Coconut Oil, 76 degree is one of the cornerstone oils for soapmaking. Coconut Oil creates large, fluffy, stable lather in handmade soap and also contributes toward hard, long lasting bars. Also great in hair conditioners, lotions, and creams. I typically use coconut oil at around 20 to 30% in my soapmaking.

Coconut oil is absorbed by the skin well and doesn't stain clothing or sheets. Great for hair care products, scrubs and balms.

To make this oil, coconuts are cut and dried until the moisture content of the meat is minimized. The dried copra is then grated and expeller pressed to remove the oil. Finally, the oil is refined to produce an oil suitable for consumption.

Shelf life: 2 years

Different sizes are available (8 ounces, 5 pounds, etc.) Please e-mail us for pricing.
